layman_description: A trap that explodes and sprays acid when zombies trigger it.
technical_description: Explosive trap entity with acid damage component and trigger radius detection.
player_impact: Damages and slows down zombie groups that walk into your traps.

layman_description: A fence post that shocks zombies that touch it.
technical_description: Defensive structure with electrical damage component and proximity triggering.
player_impact: Creates an electric perimeter that damages zombies on contact.

layman_description: A fire-based trap that ignites nearby zombies.
technical_description: Explosive device with fire damage and area effect properties.
player_impact: Burns zombies and spreads fire in trap radius.

layman_description: A floor trap with sharp spikes that injure anything stepping on it.
technical_description: Ground-level trap entity with piercing damage and trigger-based activation.
player_impact: Damages zombies walking into your base defenses.

layman_description: A metal jaw trap that catches and holds zombies temporarily.
technical_description: Mechanical trap with stun effect and hold-state management.
player_impact: Immobilizes zombies briefly while you deal with them.

layman_description: Sharp wire coils that cut anything that touches them.
technical_description: Damage-over-time object with material lacerating properties.
player_impact: Bleeds zombies and players who walk through it.

layman_description: Scattered metal spikes that slow down zombies and hurt their feet.
technical_description: Ground coverage trap with slowness effect and periodic damage ticks.
player_impact: Reduces zombie movement speed in trapped areas.

layman_description: An automated turret that shoots poisoned darts at nearby enemies.
technical_description: Automated defensive system with projectile spawning and targeting algorithm.
player_impact: Automatically shoots zombies entering its firing range.

layman_description: A stove-like trap that burns zombies passing over it.
technical_description: Stationary heat source with continuous damage output to nearby entities.
player_impact: Creates a hot zone that hurts zombies passing through.

layman_description: A switch you stand on to trigger doors or other mechanisms.
technical_description: Input device with weight-based activation and output relay logic.
player_impact: Opens doors and gates when you step on it.
